title.label: Don’t recommend, unless you want to mega spend

content.label:
Update(original review follows): This game is fatally flawed by it’s purchase structure. I am not a person that spends thousands of dollars on in game purchases (I spend some, just not thousands). I don’t expect to be able to compete with people that do, and in most games I don’t have to. In this game, however, the whales and the minnows are all thrown into the tank together. As a result, on my server, a handful of players who had spent well over $10k apiece (possibly much more) had banded together to make it impossible for anyone less spendy to progress. No amount of grinding or cleverness can make a non whale even somewhat competitive, against that much cash—the only choice was whether to be a bootlicker or victim. As a result, the server atmosphere was constantly stressful and angry.

People should spend whatever they like on games, If someone wants to dump thousands into a game, that’s fine, but a better game provides a structure that allows players at different levels a way to have fun and grow at their own scale.   Noobs compete with noobs, and whales with other whales. This game does not. The big spenders are untouchable, and the lower or non-spenders have nowhere else to go. The only way to avoid being constantly stomped upon is to pay for perpetual shields. Lose focus for a moment when a whale is watching, you are stomped, your resources and army are gone and you basically are in a coma for a week or two, during which, if you allow shields to waver, you get to start over. Hiding under a shield 24/7 and sneaking out to gather crumbs too small to interest a whale, is not much fun, for me.

As a simulation of the unhappiness and frustration of a world overrun by fanatical bands of homicidal social darwinists, the game  deserves 5 stars. As a way to have fun with a gaming budget less than the price of a small car, the game is a failure. The game is pretty entertaining up until the point where you are big enough to be tasty whale food, and then starts circling the drain. The game has elements that are really very good, but the flaws more than cancel them out.

original review:
 I like this game because actions have consequences. If you pvp, you affect the other player, if you get attacked, your forces resources and infrastructure are reduced. Also, teamwork is essential. Many games have alliances or builds, or whatever but mostly players are playing what is essentially a solo game in parallel with your team mates. This game requires team work and attention to detail.

The Warhammer fluff is Ok, but not that much of an issue.

At the start of the game when I load into it as soon as the start up is over the game instantly crashes. I want to play so bad. And I can’t even get to the support page to report on the game. Please help me I’m on ios12 and can’t find a update for the phone
Clash of Clans in the Warhammer universe.

title.label: It’s not what I was hoping for

content.label: So thought this was an awesome game until I uncovered the fact that it’s online I am a solo player so I hate online stuff and chatting with other players and wondering if they are gonna attack your base or they are terrible people who are mean and snobby
They bought the engine.
The game is designed around making the people who play it angry.

Have no problem with app developers making money and understand ads and IAP's, etc. are how they accomplish that. My only problem is how much money they want to make, and how they go about it. The prices charged through pretty much every app on ios, and I'm sure android, can be absolutely insane. Often prices are absolutely poposturous. Mind blowingly almost comically expensive. Compensation for anything is often times laughable, whether it be ads, time invested, etc. Premium in game currencies are always priced more than 10 times what they should be, more expensive than gold and it's not even real. They don't even have the decency to reimburse missing rewards when all it requires is a click of a button on their part. Insanity. Cheap little phone games that are supposed to be/advertised as free, and they cost more than AAA console games to be anything close to competitive and tolerable. It's a shame. Entire industry has become like that. So much greed by developers it's sickening.
My game keep cutting off fix it!!

title.label: Great Game but No Landscape Screen for iPad.

content.label: This is a great game. I have been playing for a month and have leveled up at a pace you would expect. I have been able to play the entire time without spending money on the game (I never spend money on games though). I play on my iPad however, and my biggest complaint is that the game WILL NOT go into landscape. This is why I gave only 4 stars. Aside from having to turn my head to the side every time I want to use my keyboard, I love this game!

title.label: It’s alright. Lack of support help.

content.label: Basically progressing you’ll need to spend and then on top of that most bugs in the game can be exploited as an attacker so any problems you have that effect you in game such as being hit with no notifications or your shield “dropping” early they won’t give you your resources or troops back. They’ll send an apology and your left to make up for a glitch in the game.
Yes I’ll game
Worst game ever. Don’t waste your time
Friend codes?
Started playing 3 months ago and really enjoy the game play and strategy required for either pay to play or free ,works either way.

The game plays well if you like strategy but it does not look like the ads in terms of gameplay. The other annoyance is that the bookmarks don’t synchronize w facebook backup. If you have this app on multiple devices, synced bookmarks are a must.

I was having a lot of fun PvE building. Then got farmed repeatedly and the rebuild time is days. In the meantime you get farmed again and again. They will sell you shields but I won’t pay money for a game I can’t do anything. 

If they can balance the attack vs defense portion of PvP this game will be a lot of fun. But for now attacking is OP and rebuilding from getting farmed takes days.

Update 9/9/20-

Elevating this to 4 stars now. So with a recent update on my iOS the game was greatly improved with stability. I appreciate the response by the developer to my review and it’s a fun game. Very competitive and if this suits your play style, then this is one of the better ones out there. I would recommend getting with a high ranking alliance though. Once the hierarchy begins, anything less than a top 5 alliance will become fodder for those in the upper ranks. So be aware of that...

Decent game and graphics. However the game is having serious stability issues at least with me on my phone. I have a iPhone 7+ with most current update. However, the game will not stay up for long and crashes back to the home screen. 

Otherwise seems to be fun game overall.
Great Graphics and a growing base definitely worth looking into if this is the type of game you play

This game is terrible. The devs are 100% garbage. Glitches and terrible servers that can’t handle events. The only thing that works 100% of the time is the "buy this package" pop-up when the game is starting up. 
Terrible customer service, even though they acknowledge that there are many glitches.

They’ve responded to my review and again acknowledged that their servers are garbage. They take in millions of dollars every year and refuse to update their equipment. I’ve had significant glitches that cost me over $100 and they’ve refused to compensate me. 

I play the game to keep in contact with my friends that I’ve met, but as far as the game goes, it’s 100% garbage. Don’t waste your time or money.

title.label: Money based .. and even then it’s very broken

content.label: Now I love warhammer and have for many years.. this “game” is truly bad though.. I gave it a long test over three months I’ll never get back. Don’t waste your time and definitely not your money on this.
Great game. They are going through some growing pains but the developers have been very helpful.

The devs don’t care about players who aren’t willing to spend a house payment a month on this game.  They keep adding updates which only  benefit the big spenders. Not only that, but it is a buggy, crashes constantly, and has little to no chat moderation so if your kids play this,  delete it now.  Do not waste your time or efforts on this hot mess of a game.

I haven’t spent a nickel on this game yet and find myself in a strong alliance with continued growth l. Personally this has been the best city building like war game I’ve played. I will say that you can compete in this game however, some whales will always out compete so that’s the nature of the beast. Find a good alliance and you’ll have a great time.

title.label: Enjoying this game more than similar games

content.label: I haven’t enjoyed one of these city build and defend games this much ever. Could be because it’s Warhammer, but the style and the world are a lot of fun. I don’t really have an issue with the PTW that some have. That being said, I cannot give it 5 stars because my enjoyment has been hampered by a pretty nasty tactic. There is a group that teleports their city next to ours and just devastates is and teleports out. I log in to find I was attacked, I have no idea how strong my enemy is, I cannot attack back and I cannot find them on the map. It seems to me this kind of tactic isn’t what the devs were aiming for and is borderline harassment since it goes against fair play. I would have made the teleport usages have a cool down so groups could have fun with attack retaliation and the strategy involved.
Game had a merge and I lost the account, admin has never responded.  Do not play this app.

2 days ago a server merge occurred, I am still left in a dead barren world unable to transfer. Apple does not provide an updated version of the game that others in the game say is required to continue play! I have almost 4 months and $ into a game that Is unplayable now. Very angry...

If you play this on iOs you will get screwed over repeatedly either by Tilting Point and/or Apple. Don’t ignore this warning. I have one of the top accounts on my server and I am just about ready to bash my head into a wall.

They don’t even bother with simple easy bug fixes anymore on iOs because it’s always a huge problem.

You would think the developers would have the updates ready before they implement something new. That is not the case. Multiple times now, something new is implemented yet those of us on iOS cannot play because “it doesn’t work”. There are better war games out there. Save your money.

I was leveling my hq from 7 to 8 but I had deleted my quarry to move it but my hq finished while I didn’t have a quarry. Now I’m stuck in a screen because it’s trying to force me to build the cave. Which a quarry is required for. There is literally nothing I can do. Please help.

title.label: First review after over a year spent in the game

content.label:
I would like to express my dissapointment in how the support and the developers handle the game issues, bugs, support tickets and etc. After over a year of play it feels like the developers became sloppy and have begun slacking. Over the period of the last month or two there have been back to back to back issues and bugs which resulted in many efforts, time, money, energy, etc just being wasted. The awnsers which we get from the developers is “We are sorry, here is our compensation - 1k gems (which in this game is equal to litteraly just 1 teleport, in short the compensation is not worth anything). On big events which require all players from an Alliances coordinatig with their members across several time zones, sacrificing real life time, delaying chores and what not, spending alot of
money (Packs and timers in this game are huge and expensive) all so that when the event starts, the event is bugged, all efforts are flushed down the drain, and in the end we just get a “Sorry here is a banana to compensate your trouble”. Normally this wouldnt be a problem if this was a rare occasion but the problems are happening more and more frequently. As of now theres atleast 2x major problems each week. Considering ALOT of money has been thrown into this game due to building taking from 120-400 days to upgrade at higher levels unless you buy 99$ packs to get it done faster (1x 99$ pack gets u cca 60 days of reduced upgrade time). What have they done with all this money and trust thrown in the game? NOTHING! The game itself feels now like a crazy train going downhill and everything the develepors do seems like they are trying to milk out as much money as possible before the game dies as it stands now. I have only one thing to say to the developers, they should be ashamed of themselves blaming the pandemic for the issues and not working in the office. We are ALL affected by the pandemic, and even if we know there will probably be an economic crissis we spent huge money on the game just to get an excuse which is shamefull!

Been here since Day 1. The game could be truly fantastic but it’s managed by a team that hardly plays the game and constantly nerfs the Gameplay into the ground. “Hey we just released highly requested Fortress skins... It’ll only cost $2,000 to full upgrade one of 5 different skins”
Some timers take 300+ Days at higher levels. Any chances F2P players had at getting an progress done are slowly being stripped from the game in favor of $100 packs that do very little.

It’s another game that has mishandled a great IP.
Unfair practice and unfair game management by developers. Bad product support and poor customer service 👎👎👎
垃圾一樣，甚至沒有亞洲語言翻譯，這就是這遊戲為什麼只有可憐的3.5k的人。

Ever since the last update, the game will kick you out every 30 seconds. I haven’t been able to get back on in awhile, and support will not even work with you unless there are screenshots? How can you screenshot your game keep kicking you out? Anyway, the game is unplayable for some people. Some people don’t see an issue, but that’s lucky few I’ve seen.

Will never play another game by either Tilting Point or Haunted Cow.  

The developers in this game have acted in an irresponsible and lazy manner, allowing players to routinely cheat without repercussions.

Most recently it was confirmed that several players have engaged in VPN hopping to buy credits through Steam in foreign currencies. 

Given the games heavy pay-to-win structure, it will be a waste of time to start the game as a new player, and no perk, change or switch will level the playing field.   Nothing worse than a cheat, except the people with the ability to stop it who do nothing.

title.label: PAY TO WIN!! Credit card hero’s unite!!!

content.label: I played this game for months. I was in the 5th best alliance and still got massively bullied by credit card hero’s who made up rules and controlled every aspect of the game. The only way to even survive is to PAY TO WIN/ survive. I see a few people who say others are just salty about the game. But you get special powerful troops and speed ups the more you SPEND! I don’t mind throwing some money at the Developers. But this game is just PAY TO WIN! Period. Graphics and UI was the only good thing about this game. People are leaving in droves won’t last much longer.

I have been playing this game casually over the past year.  It’s got similar issues with all the games in the genre but im not here to outline pros/cons and get into a geeky review mode.

As of 3 days ago, ive encountered a game breaking mechanic.  I was attacked and annihilated while under the effect of a shield (can throw on shields to prevent pvp incursions in this game).  I was dumbfounded when this took place.  I took screenshots and reached out to the person who attacked me to see whether he/she/they were hacking or something, and the response was even more disturbing. 

Apparently this was a known issue and that when players shield they may not always “shield” in reality and can be attacked by others.

I immediately contacted the development team to ask for a recourse for millions of resources lost including millions to heal my troops which probably sent me back at least 4 months of my casual play activities.  This was 3 days ago and i have not received a single response as of typing of this review.

To me this fundamentally shows the importance this company puts on their customer base and this level of borked game play and mechanics should only be expected at a pre-alpha game testing stage, and not for a game in service for over a year.

Truly disappointing and incredible let down.  

Until they get their act together, id highly recommend moving on to another game.  Dont bother downloading - waste of your phone memory at this point in time...
It’s really fun

title.label: Money grab with poor support team attitude

content.label: I’ve been a long time player, since mid June 2019. I use to play it quite often, now with the money grabs and the sour taste of their Support Team from my latest issue with Warlord. I would not recommend this game to anyone. It’s a big money grab and you are better off playing Raid. Their support team has always been amazing..

title.label: What can I say?? Its Warhammer

content.label: This is one build your own fortress strategy game that captures you from the start...from the script to the art style this one really stands out the gritty warhammer feeling really works well with this type of game and im not one to play these much!!!!!

Ive played this game for about a week. So far it’s been a great game up to this point,  it’s true you have to be in a alliance to  get the best out of this game . But I think that applies to any game like this. I do like the game play  as well as a lot of the other events. But like I said I just started, Now for the bad part... I have been stuck on the title page saying loading skulls for over a day,     Can’t seem to find a way to stop this problem. .  No customer service to contact. ,   Since I can’t get past the title page  .   Other than that  my next review will be in a couple of weeks if I can get past this problem

If you don’t pay to win you’ll get crushed completely, and recovering isn’t really going to happen. If you do pay to win, you’ll get crushed by someone who has paid more when the devs merge your server with another one that’s out ranks yours.

The game may seem very similar to most of the strategy games on mobile, which I also thought at first but it’s different, not a Extremely significant difference but it has more depth to it than the other strategy games I have seen on mobile, And the best part about it? It’s Warhammer what’s not to love. Some suggestions I have is to keep constantly updating the game, add more units as well, one of the downside I had to this was a lack of units, it’s not like their is barely any units, but more units will make this game more fun, and keep people interested, also the other thing that I suggest, that a lot of people have been suggesting is show the battle, like so we can see what’s going on and so we can command the troops, I know that’s a lot to ask but it would make the game way more different than most strategy games like this, it will be like a mini Total War: Warhammer, So far I’m liking it, and these are my suggestions. Thank you for this great game!

title.label: I will see how it goes..

content.label: So far, love the game...will add more later..only played @ 96 hrs

I’ve played a lot of games like this. Build your city, train your troops, etc. Among them though, I think this one is top-tier. As long as you use your resources correctly, it becomes relatively smooth sailing. Right now I’m keep level 9 with no ptw. So I’d recommend that people try this game for at least three days before giving a rating!

When we went through maintenance I was going to update the game I tried to but when I was about to it said open when I clicked on it it would take me but into the app and ask for a update and u click it and it only say open like it’s done and after that u go in say icon telling u you need to update fix this I love the game just can’t playable anymore I also remove the game 3 times to hope it fix its self that didn’t happen I really want to play this game
Would be a great game if the “required” upgrade worked.

title.label: Out of date when you just downloaded it

content.label: I’m stuck at a pop up that says the game is out of date when I just downloaded it.

Game won’t let you change server. No support. I logged in to the newest server which was 12 days old.  I couldn’t view any other servers, no one knew when the next server would open. I was told you can’t change servers your locked to the one you start on,  TRASH!!!!
I love this game in all ways but I have a problem with lag and my game keeps crashing so the only problem I can find is the graphics and of course the amount of lag there is for my iPad
